contextId.information: "Do not trust in deceitful words, saying" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
contextId.quote: Do not entrust yourself to deceitful words and say

contextId.information: This is emphatic and stresses that Yahweh is the one who will do this. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
The word "themselves" is used for emphasis to specify the people of Jerusalem and the other cities of Judah. AT: "the people from the ruined cities" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_rpronouns]])
